item.title: Kharghar, Ulwe, Dronagiri face water cuts starting Sunday

description.p: Residents in Kharghar, Ulwe, and Dronagiri nodes brace for water supply disruptions starting this Sunday. The City and Industrial Development Corporation (CIDCO) announced planned maintenance impacting the Hetawane dam pipeline.

The shutdown begins at 10:00 AM on Sunday, July 7th, and stretches until 10:00 AM on Monday, July 8th. Water supply will be completely suspended during this period, CIDCO officials confirmed. Residents are advised to store sufficient water in advance.

item.title: Hindu Group Protests "Anti-Religious" Ad at Vashi Showroom

description.p: A demonstration erupted outside a clothing store in Vashi Sector 17 yesterday afternoon. Members of a local Hindu organization alleged that the store's advertisement was offensive to their religious sentiments. The protest caused a brief disruption to traffic near the station.
Demonstrators gathered around 3 PM, chanting slogans and demanding the removal of the advertisement. Police arrived on the scene and managed to contain the protest. No arrests were made.
